---
title: Generate ukboundaries mini from ukboundaries pckage
---

```{r ukboundaries-package}
devtools::install_github("robinlovelace/ukboundaries")

ukboundaries = sf::st_drop_geometry(
  ukboundaries::msoa2011_vsimple[, 
    c("msoa11cd", "msoa11nm")]
  )

pryr::object_size(ukboundaries)
# usethis::use_data(ukboundaries)
```
